__e: I thought it might lead to some discipline, make a man of him, with Daddy not being there.
Deep down, I think we've all been craving the structure you've brought to the house.

I know you've always been of two minds in relation to this that therapy is more than a discipline, that it's actually a religion, but you also say we're therapists, so we can't really... run our patients lives for them.
Discipline has become a theme in my life, thanks to you.
The first step to discipline is control through fear.
What this town needs is a good dose of discipline. And soon.
